website_summaries.verdict: When you're looking for an upgrade at a budget price point, this Celeron processor is a smart selection.
pros: Basic CPU chip for those who need a processor for simple computing tasks at a low price
Compares favorably to other low priced CPUs with a processor speed of 2.9GHz
Doesn't need to draw a lot of power to run at its maximum speed
cons: Certainly does not give you the high performance level of more expensive Intel processors

customer_reviews.title: Great processor for light tasks or media center pc's
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to beat this processor for the price. It is excellent for mining rigs and very low power consumption. Having said that I think it would also be a fine processor for a media center pc or a basic computer that's used for editing documents, watching Youtube, surfing the web. It would probably even handle light gaming on some e-sports titles. For those that don't know, it has on-board video. So, a graphics card is not required either. You could literally build a working pc around this processor for probably less than $200.
customer_reviews.author: Beastykato

customer_reviews.title: For people that don't know, it includes a cooling ...
customer_reviews.text: For people that don't know, it includes a cooling fan with pre applied thermal paste. I didn't know this and had already bought a fan. Since my i7 chip didn't bring a fan thought this one wouldn't either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There was a delay in the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Note: UPS ended up delivering my package as opposed to USPS but it's okay I still got it. Another Note: To use this on any motherboard that accepts Skylake processors requires you to update the BIOS. I did that for my H110M Gaming motherboard from MSI and it works just fine. Another Note: When you switch from Skylake to Kaby Lake using Windows 10, it will work, but your resolution will be reduced to UXGA or 1024 x 768. You can switch it back with Display settings. Make sure your version of Windows 10 is activated before using the new processor. If you have Windows 7, it won't work due to Kaby Lake processors not allowing updates.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Peregrino

customer_reviews.title: Solid CPU for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid processor for the price, the included cooler works as expected, and the low power consumption is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew S.

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea Celerons had improved so much. I'm used to the old school Celerons that couldn't do anything. I put this in my mining rig and it run just fine. I haven't done any gaming but for day to day use it seems just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Krell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible value, but only cheap option for 100/200 series motherboards anymore.
customer_reviews.text: About the only cheap option even available if you have a few year-old motherboard from Intel. But it's an absolutely terrible value when you can get a better chip from them for the same price if you have a "300-series" capable motherboard... Unfortunately, my old motherboard supports only "100" and "200" series, so this was the cheapest way (at time of purchase at least) to get it up and running and useful again as a second rig for messing around with... If you're reading this around 2020 (when I'm writing it) and don't have a motherboard yet, go look at AMD's stuff instead... Even a first gen R3 1200 mops the floor with this on a cheap AM4 board.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just get a $65 Ryzen 3 1200, or whatever the equivalent is when reading
customer_reviews.text: got it for a bitcoin setup with the intention of possible personal use if mining wasn't profitable at the time, well you can't really game on this even if you got an awesome GPU. But you can however do most any gaming quite nicely on a Ryzen 3 paired with a powerful GPU. Only would've run me about 20 more at the time of purchase had I known that at the time
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie & Family

customer_reviews.title: For $40 this processor is a great value. Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: For $40 this processor is a great value. Meets my needs. Plays Netflix in HD flawlessly and I'm happy with the integrated graphics. As an all-around decent processor for the average non-gaming joe, I think it rocks. I'm running a Linux OS with 8GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 64GB SSD.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Review of Intel BX80677G3930 7th Gen Celeron
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Intel BX80677G3930 7th Gen Celeron to put into a Gigabyte cryptocurrency mining board, as it was good value-for-money and recommended. Installation was easy, with the CPU sitting securely in the socket. The heatsink worked well, and overall the CPU was quiet and ran at a cool temperature. Worth the effort to run in a mining rig, probably not suitable for any high-end gaming, and I'd rather recommend a Core i3 at the bear minimum.
customer_reviews.author: CraigV

customer_reviews.title: Great cpu for the price if You are making a non-gaming computer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little processor for the price if You are making a non-gaming computer. It was easy to install, and comes with paste already applied. It is also very quiet. The fan is barely audible under normal operating circumstances. While this is not a gaming processor, it is perfect for everyday home or office use. I put this one in a micro ATX setup, and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Danny William Yu Woo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very cheaply.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap processor with more than enough power for the mining backend. Although a dual core for every day computing is not much.
customer_reviews.author: SysopJ

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap and depending what you need it for will get the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are targeted at low cost computers. I built my first mining rig using this and so far it works great. No problems yet and no complaints. Easy install too. I didn't realize the heat paste was already on it, so I smeared it a little and went to buy more just in case. Shouldn't need expert installation for another $100. Watch a quick video if you must because it's not grueling to install at all.. 4 "clicks" in on each corner = thumbs up. Just don't break it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: and youtube cat video watchers it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Paired with 8gbs of ram and a 120gb ssd this thing is sporty. For your average internet surfers, word processors, and youtube cat video watchers it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Celerons have come a long way
customer_reviews.text: It's only 7th gen, but wow this is faster than I was expecting. Not for gaming of course, but this thing flies through everyday computing with an ssd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Using this in FreeNAS but I'd imagine it would also be suitable for pfSense or OpnSense. Can't really get much more for the value, even the lowest end 7th generation is going to be quick under these sort of apps, and it supports ECC!
customer_reviews.author: MaxBurn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for Windows 7
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for Windows 7... which is what I wanted to use. Wish I had a heads up on that BEFORE I bought it. Had to upgrade to Win10 (boo), then it stopped giving error messages. It's pretty fast though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super basic
customer_reviews.text: This is good just to turn the computer on. Don’t ask for much for the price. If you want to game go to the i5 6600k. I think that is the lowest you should go for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Y Grullon

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: amazon with its internal problems I cancel my purchase and after they sent the pieces that they wanted, I preferred to buy the pc in another side
customer_reviews.author: luis lugo

customer_reviews.title: Product Was Not New
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that I was being shipped a new CPU and Fan. The CPU and Fan were clearly used. The thermal paste on the fan was smeared and it was missing its plastic casing, while the CPU just rattled around in the box, luckily it was inside its plastic casing. The CPU also had clear indications that thermal paste had been wiped off of it. If this was supposed to be used, there was no indication of that when purchasing the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Durga

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price If you are just looking to web browse, or write papers, this is the CPU for you. Do it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Mining Rig's heart
customer_reviews.text: 7th gen Celeron - what can I say.... I definitely wouldn't buy this if it wasn't for a mining rig. It is quite slow compared to even an i3.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Gaming? No. Farming? yes.
customer_reviews.text: Fast! If you are mining or surfing than this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: dkraft

customer_reviews.title: Rad
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god. It's so amazing. It's the best thing... Also it's cheap and relatively powerful. It worked for me. No issues after 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: The Cpu is in used condition
customer_reviews.text: The box was not sealed. The item might have been previously used. The thermal paste is in bad condition
customer_reviews.author: Elnur

customer_reviews.title: worked like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Original, worked like a champ. Used it on a mini-file-server and processor usage never goes above 50% even with 10 people using the file server.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Solid little processor. Easy to set up and works every time. It performs much better than I expected and it's efficient. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Morr

customer_reviews.title: Works well, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly as intended for my application. Was surprised at how responsive the system was with this CPU, but granted I don't do anything CPU intensive.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive workhorse.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cheap processor that does the job.It runs a multi-gpu mining pc along with a Burstcoin hard drive miner without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Renee

customer_reviews.title: Slowest of all time
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed to for the price but it’s seriously so slow it’s not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my mining rig and some light file server operations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: The CPU is working perfectly, and putting overtime in the Rig. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PETER DIXON

customer_reviews.title: Epic Processor for mining rigs. Purchased 2 of them ...
customer_reviews.text: Epic Processor for mining rigs. Purchased 2 of them so far running simple mining. No issues. Pros - $40. Cons – Definitely not a gaming processor. Unless you are into gaming, this thing rocks for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Naomii

customer_reviews.title: Great budget processor!
customer_reviews.text: Happy to get a later generation processor at a low price point to run the mining rig. =)

customer_reviews.title: basic cpu
customer_reviews.text: its a dual core celeron 2.9 not bad for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but perfect for mining rig or similar, no complaints, included CPU heat sink and fan work perfectly...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it to mine and it's been good so far for about 3 months

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not fast but good for what I am using for

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent procesor for the price. Had it for two months no issue.

customer_reviews.title: The goto Chip for GPU Crypto mining.
customer_reviews.text: Its relatively cheap and it works. What else is there to say about it.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for simple needs
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap processor for applications with little CPU power needs

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to, and that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to, and that is a good thing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome CPU. Used them to mine Crypto, so I'm sure that's why they are having a shortage.

customer_reviews.title: all you ever need on mining
customer_reviews.text: im own a second one now for my rig. Yup, you get the point

customer_reviews.title: Used but not like new
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, but the items description used like new, when received there was some dirt on the cpu like its been used for long time, but its works fine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SUPER NICE PRODUCT, SUPER FAST SHIPPING, QUALITY ALL THE WAY!

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mining
customer_reviews.text: Works great for mining. Low power consumption compared and good enough to run on any rig. Install of processor and cooling fan is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for the budget and performance
customer_reviews.text: Great price and just what I needed! Very well packaged and super fast shipping- now powering my Ethereum rig!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what it says it is...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for low end CPU. Works well in my mining rigs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Does not come as shown. All you get is the processor. No heatsink and fan. Showing the blue box for the picture makes you think you get it. You don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap, efficient, weak processor that is perfect for low budget, hands off tasks where cost is more important than performance. I stuck one in my most recent mining rig and it is likely the only component I have yet to encounter trouble with.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Merriel

customer_reviews.title: it's a great processor if you want a basic
customer_reviews.text: it's a great processor if you want a basic pc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to put in my Rig for Miner! very good
customer_reviews.author: Billy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a 35 dollar CPU. Does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vanslambrouck

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good inexpensive CPU for a low power build
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good inexpensive CPU for a low power build. Running with my MSI Z270-A PRO with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kostyantyn Halanets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will Not work with ASROCK H81 PRO incorrectly linked to that product
customer_reviews.author: Reviewssssss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 card mining Rig! I Really trust Intel parts!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does its job
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does its job. I'm using this for a mining rig and so far I do not have any problems with it. I would not use this CPU for any intense work like processing photos or videos. This chip was meant for surfing the web or using Word.
customer_reviews.author: defaultTop Contributor: Travel Guides & Tips

customer_reviews.title: Not a good 12 GPU mining server CPU
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend going this low for a 12 GPU mining rig. The CPU runs at a constant 59% + while mining. Causing the rest of the machine to lag and monitoring software to report the server down when in fact it is lagging. I would shoot for a low end I3 at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow, slow and... slow.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why Celerons exist. They are slow to begin with, and as soon as you throw anything more CPU intensive than Microsoft Word at it, they cave. This was recommended for a mining rig, and if you think "well, the GPUs will be doing all the work" - how do you think you're going to install the OS or just update drivers? I'm going to eat the $50 I wasted on this helpless waif and get the i5 I wanted in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Breakwater IT Services

customer_reviews.title: Received a used item
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a new item, instead I received an open box unit with a used CPU bouncing around inside with no protective case, covered in old thermal paste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What exactly do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: It's a Celeron. It's cheap. It will run any x86 OS you need it to for mining or simple server applications.
customer_reviews.author: mineyourbiz

customer_reviews.title: Strongest Compound in the World. If only the twin towers was made out of this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to break my Delider I got on here. I love the new super Cement compound they are using. Ended up giving up on the idea of deliding of it after cutting my finger. They should of made 9/11 out the compound they used to construct this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Chip for Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chip to use in a crytocurrency mining rig. Was surprised at its power for such a cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Good budget CPU for mining rig!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended for my mining rig! No issues setting up, pre-applied thermal paste on ugly fan/heatsink makes for a nice instant plug & play install.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a crypto mining rig. Even after applying all required fixes, the CPU just can't handle Ethminer.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain, does the job at a very low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Snapper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent for mining rigs and very low power consumption.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works fine but intel CPU's are known to be compromised to hackers.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Ethereum Mining Rig. Uses next to no Power. Its a fast CPU too.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Fast enough for budget gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great cpu and its fast for a budget. Bench marks at just over 3000 points on passmark. Got one for $40 and it worked perfect for a cheap gaming pc running games like skyrim at 57-60fps with an R9 360 GPU. Note: I had to rest my bios to older version for it to work on my board. removing and replacing the bio battery did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Barrioscriptures

customer_reviews.title: Great Processor for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Low price for a moderate processor. My new computer that it is installed on returned a 6.9 Windows Experience for the processor. The processor speed does show as 2.9 GHz. Considering I have another computer with a Core I7 4.0 GHz (way more money) that is overclocked and it tops out the Windows Experience with 7.9 for the processor, this is a very good bang for the buck if you do not need a decked out gaming computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Garrison

customer_reviews.title: the price was excellent for my rig
customer_reviews.text: Worked flawlessly for my needs, the price was excellent for my rig.
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE

customer_reviews.title: However I trust it will work more than fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have not implemented it yet. However I trust it will work more than fine.

customer_reviews.title: but it's fine for $40
customer_reviews.text: This micro it's only for turn on your PC you can't do it anything, but it's fine for $40
